string.value: #b#p9270062##k was so impressed with one of the merry-go-round he saw during his recent trip, that he decided to build on in Kampung village for little kids.

In order to build a nice sturdy merry-go-round, #b#p9270062##k needs plenty of #b#t4000478##k. Will Kampung village have its very own merry-go-round? 

#o9420540# #r#a45601##k 
#t4000478# #r#c4000478#/200#k
Kampung's very own merry-go-round is finally completed and look at all those joy in little kids' faces!
You know, one of the most marvelous things I saw during my recent trip was the big merry-go-round. If we had one of those in our own Kampung village, all of our kids would be so happy.
You know what? I will just build one myself. I'm quite handy, you know... Haha! But I need some materials to work with. Will you collect some #b#t4000478##k for me?
I'm glad that you would volunteer to help. Remember, I need at least #b200 #t4000478##k from #b#o9420540##k to build the entire merry-go-round.
I thought you loved kids in Kampung village just as much as I did.
Finally! We will be able to have our very own merry-go-round!
Who would ever have thought of a merry-go-round in Kampung village but me? Haha!
I need at least #b200 #t4000478##k to build up the entire merry-go-round.
You have to hunt at least #b200 #o9420540##k in order to get the right number of #b#t4000478##k I need.
